text: Talk is cheap. Show me the code
author: Linus Torvalds

text: Code teaches you how to face really big problems
author: Jack Dorsey

text: Whether you want to uncover the secrets of the universe, or you just want to pursue a career in the 21st century, basic Computer Programming is an essential skill to learn
author: Stephen Hawking

text: The most damaging phrase in the language is "It's always been done this way"
author: Grace Hopper

text: The trouble with programmers is that you can never tell what a programmer is doing until it's too late
author: Seymour Cray

text: You might not think that programmers are artists, but programming is an extremely creative profession. It's logic based creativity
author: John Romero

text: Programming is usually taught by examples
author: Niklaus Wirth

text: All of my friends who have younger siblings who are going to college or high school - my number one piece of advice is: You should learn how to program
author: Mark Zuckerberg

text: The computer programmer is a creator of universes for which he alone is responsible. Universes of virtually unlimited complexity can be created in the form of computer programs
author: Joseph Weizenbaum

text: While there's code, there's bug
author: Anonymous

text: I'm not a great programmer; I'm just a good programmer with great habits
author: Kent Beck

text: Computers are good at following instructions, but not at reading your mind
author: Donald Knuth

text: Code never lies, comments sometimes do
author: Ron Jeffries

text: If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in
author: Edsger Dijkstra

text: Computer viruses are an urban legend
author: Peter Norton

text: You cannot avoid bugs. Write code that changes lane in face of bug
author: Aditya Chatterjee

text: The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before
author: Bill Gates

text: In 1970s, Computing was not a science. Thanks to the legends who made it is as important as Physics & Mathematics
author: Aditya Chatterjee

text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand
author: Martin Fowler

text: Premature optimization is the root of all evil
author: Donald Knuth
